subtests.name: Test IDL implementation of Idle Detection API
IdleManager interface: existence and properties of interface object
IdleManager interface object length
IdleManager interface object name
IdleManager interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object
IdleManager interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's "constructor" property
IdleManager interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's @@unscopables property
IdleManager interface: operation query(IdleOptions)
IdleManager must be primary interface of navigator.idle
Stringification of navigator.idle
IdleManager interface: navigator.idle must inherit property "query(IdleOptions)" with the proper type
IdleManager interface: calling query(IdleOptions) on navigator.idle with too few arguments must throw TypeError
IdleStatus interface: existence and properties of interface object
IdleStatus interface object length
IdleStatus interface object name
IdleStatus interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object
IdleStatus interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's "constructor" property
IdleStatus interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's @@unscopables property
IdleStatus interface: attribute state
IdleStatus interface: attribute onchange
IdleStatus must be primary interface of idle
Stringification of idle
IdleStatus interface: idle must inherit property "state" with the proper type
IdleStatus interface: idle must inherit property "onchange" with the proper type
IdleState interface: existence and properties of interface object
IdleState interface object length
IdleState interface object name
IdleState interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object
IdleState interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's "constructor" property
IdleState interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's @@unscopables property
IdleState interface: attribute user
IdleState interface: attribute screen
IdleState must be primary interface of idle.state
Stringification of idle.state
IdleState interface: idle.state must inherit property "user" with the proper type
IdleState interface: idle.state must inherit property "screen" with the proper type
Navigator interface: existence and properties of interface object
WorkerNavigator interface: attribute idle
WorkerNavigator interface: navigator must inherit property "idle" with the proper type
